item.title: Restaurant Brands earnings miss as Burger King, Popeyes and Tim Hortons post same-store sales declines
item.description: Restaurant Brands International missed first-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as same-store sales fell at Burger King, Popeyes and Tim Hortons.

item.title: Nintendo forecasts sales of 15 million Switch 2 consoles as it gears up for launch
item.description: Nintendo said it expects to sell 15 million units of its new Switch 2 console in the fiscal year ending March 2026.

item.title: Maersk, a bellwether for global trade, cuts container market outlook on U.S.-China tariff tensions
item.description: Danish shipping giant Maersk on Thursday posted stronger-than-expected first-quarter operating profit and maintained its full-year profit guidance.

item.title: AppLovin shares pop on earnings beat as it announces sale of mobile gaming business
item.description: AppLovin shares soared in extended trading after the company beat first-quarter expectations and announced the sale of its mobile gaming business.

item.title: Carvana's record quarterly results top Wall Street expectations
item.description: Carvana's first-quarter results easily topped Wall Street's expectations as the company reported record sales.
